---
title: "Everglades Wading Bird Project Methods"
---

The official methods for the Everglades Wading Bird Project, which includes detailed monitoring data for the 3 Water Conservation Areas (WCAs) in the Everglades, and additional monitoring data from across the entire Greater Everglades Ecosystem.

All data is available in near real-time in the [Everglades Wading Bird Project GitHub Repository](github.com/weecology/EvergladesWadingBird) and [actively archived to Zenodo)(https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.7734553).
Data can be accessed through the [wader R package](https://github.com/weecology/wader).
